publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1187 John Swinney: Draft Valuation and Rating (Exempted Classes) (Scotland) Order 2008—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Valuation and Rating (Exempted Classes) (Scotland) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Jim Mather*, Stewart Stevenson*

S3M-1187 John Swinney: Draft Valuation and Rating (Exempted Classes) (Scotland) Order 2008—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Valuation and Rating (Exempted Classes) (Scotland) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Jim Mather, Stewart Stevenson
